Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 143rd overall pick, by Florida in 2011...
Traded from Florida to Milwaukee on 7/31/2012 (Going to FLA: 3B E. Encarnacion. Going to MIL: P R. Swiger)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Oakland on 2/23/2013 (Going to OAK: P M. Hisey, P R. Swiger, C D. Navarro. Going to MIL: C K. Shoppach, P J. Fulchino)...
Injured on 8/5/2013 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/21/2015 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/6/2016 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 8 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/9/2018...
Injured on 8/30/2018 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2018, going 3-0, 0.69...
Had first career hit on 5/31/2020, off Paul Carter Jr. (HOU)...
Injured on 6/5/2020 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/2021 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 6/1/2022, off Spud Chandler Jr. (LAN)...
Injured on 9/2/2022 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 2022...
Won World Championship with Oakland in 2023...
